content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1642709858236{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://www.radxrad.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/banner2-1.png?id=275) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”About” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”int-header”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1615318380332{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]The RADx-rad Discoveries and Data Coordinating Center (DCC) is a partnership of the University of California San Diego (UC San Diego),  University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston (UTHealth), and Yale University that brings together informatics/data scientists and infectious diseases specialists to facilitate data collection, harmonization, and sharing, as well as to provide standardized viral samples and testing protocols to support RADx-rad awardees. Our goal is to support awardees in the development, evaluation and pathway to approval for novel diagnostics to assure rapid and scalable impact in response to the COVID-19 Pandemic.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”pi-sec” el_class=”avarta-row” css=”.vc_custom_1638558713311{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Principal Investigators” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInDown” css=”.vc_custom_1638557544667{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”round”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”92″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” el_class=”round”][vc_custom_heading text=”Yale University” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%231e73be” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1681155648297{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Lucila Ohno-Machado, MD PhD

Biomedical Informatics and Data Sciences

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1278″ img_size=”800×800″ alignment=”right” el_class=”round”][vc_custom_heading text=”UC SAN DIEGO” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%231e73be” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1638559855973{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Eliah Aronoff-Spencer, MD PhD

Division of Infectious Diseases and Global Public Health

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”90″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” el_class=”round”][vc_custom_heading text=”Yale University” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%231e73be” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1681221885733{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Hua Xu, PhD

Biomedical Informatics and Data Sciences

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”NIH Team” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1615319020742{padding: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]

Program Officer

  • Yanli Wang, PhD

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647022470595{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]

Project Scientists

  • Marie Gallagher, BS
  • Dina Demner-Fushman, MD PhD
  • Xincheng (Ted) Zheng, MD, PhD
  • Zheng Anthony Kirilusha, PhD

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1638558797758{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Administration Core” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638558351598{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]The administration core will be responsible for all logistics and communications for the Consortium. In addition, it will facilitate all Data Sharing and Data Use Agreements necessary for collecting as well as distributing data generated by the Consortium.

Core Director: Lucila Ohno-Machado, MD PhD, PI[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1681155842518{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]Yale University
Biomedical Informatics and Data Sciences

  • Pritham Ram, Program Manager

UC San Diego
Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health

  • Cinnamon Bloss, PhD, Associate Professor
  • Camille Nebeker, EdD MS, Associate Professor

UCSD Health Department of Biomedical Informatics

  • Melissa Aquino, Research Coordinator
  • Erin L. Bailey, MSW, Consortium Program Manager

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Data Core” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638558466050{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]The Data Core will develop tools and provide services to assist awardees with data collection (e.g., the use of common data elements – CDEs), data harmonization (e.g., mappings of study variables to standards), and data sharing (e.g., secure hosting of data).

Core Director: Hua Xu, PhD, PI[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1681155418940{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]UTHealth
School of Biomedical Informatics

  • Elmer Bernstam, MD MS, Professor
  • Jingcheng Du, PhD, Assistant Professor
  • Xiaoqian Jiang, PhD, Professor
  • Kirk Roberts, PhD, Assistant Professor

School of Medicine

  • Shiqiang Tao, PhD, Assistant Professor
  • GQ Zhang, PhD, Professor
  • Xiaojin Li, PhD, Assistant Professor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638558905291{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]UC San Diego
San Diego Supercomputer Center

  • Peter Rose, PhD, Project Scientist
  • Ilya Zaslavsky, PhD, Research Scientist

UCSD Health Department of Biomedical Informatics

  • Tsung-Ting Kuo, PhD, Assistant Professor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1638558839125{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Discovery and Diagnostics Core” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638558845858{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]The Diagnostics Core will support awardees to produce high quality, usable and effective tests. The core will provide expert consultation, best practices, viral standards with variants and non-coronaviruses, and assist with vendors, purchasing and regulatory issues. The core will provide expert consultation and through web-based Question & Answer tools and respond to awardee requests and other services through the resource portal.

Core Director: Eliah Aronoff-Spencer, MD PhD, PI[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638559494720{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]UC San Diego Department of Medicine, Division of Infectious Disease and Global Public Health

  • Aaron Carlin, MD PhD, Assistant Professor
  • Robert T Schooley, MD, Professor and Division Chief
  • Davey Smith, MD, Division Chief

UC San Diego Department of Pathology

  • David Pride, MD PhD, Professor

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1638559507068{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_class=”team-box”]San Diego Supercomputer Center (UC San Diego)

  • Peter Rose, PhD, Project Scientist
  • David Valintine, PhD, Senior Programmer
  • Ilya Zavlasky, PhD, Research Scientist

Qualcomm Institute (UC San Diego)

  • Alexandra Hubenko, MBA, Program Manager
  • Johnny Nguyen, Project Specialist
  • Yves Theriault, PhD, Project Management and Strategy Specialist

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”avarta-row”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][vc_custom_heading text=”External Advisory Board” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”fadeInDown” css=”.vc_custom_1638558925978{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”round”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1783″ img_size=”599×599″ alignment=”right”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1625610884510{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”]
